1604068013_mirrored_JabbaDesilijicTiure_.body: On Python 3.7 and above, using greenlet 0.4.17 requires gevent 20.9.0.
Without any sort of traceback, I don't know what to tell you about that exception.

Prior to https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroNet/commit/ea6016d004eeb1c8f2927d171fae615d1afc7d8e#diff-71a02f5e0de4b6dc6aaa7cdeba68f649, `ZeroNet.util.ThreadPool` was using undocumented gevent internals that have changed in an incompatible way.
